ValidationRule.description: SF-93 This validation rule should ensure, that all Zip Codes are in the correct format according to their respective country.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK( Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s )), ISPICKVAL( Construction_Site_Address__CountryCode__s , "GB") ), NOT( OR( REGEX(Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s, ("[A-Z][0-9][ ][0-9][A-Z][A-Z]")), REGEX(Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s, ("[A-Z][A-Z][0-9][ ][0-9][A-Z][A-Z]")), REGEX(Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s, ("[A-Z][A-Z][0-9][0-9][ ][0-9][A-Z][A-Z]")), REGEX(Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s, ("[A-Z][0-9][0-9][ ][0-9][A-Z][A-Z]")), REGEX(Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s, ("[A-Z][0-9][A-Z][ ][0-9][A-Z][A-Z]")), REGEX(Construction_Site_Address__PostalCode__s, ("[A-Z][A-Z][0-9][A-Z][ ][0-9][A-Z][A-Z]")) ) ), FALSE) && $Permission.Core_Opportunity_Bypass_Validation_Rules = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid format for the Zip Code! This should follow one of these examples: A9 9AA, AA9 9AA, AA99 9AA, A99 9AA, A9A 9AA or AA9A 9AA.
